item.title: The Black Jersey
item.description: It takes until page 280 for the main character to say, “I am an imbecile,” which is the truest thing in the book. Oh boy. So many feelings. That are conflicted. Is this a book about cycling? Yes. Do I love cycling? Yes. Do I love books about cycling?
